mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TC_ADMIN_MS WHERE 1=1 AND ADMIN_SN = #{adminSn}
SELECT * FROM TC_ADMIN_MS ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC LIMIT (#{page}-1)*#{pageSize} , #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TC_ADMIN_MS (ADMIN_SN, ADMIN_ID, ADMIN_PW, ADMIN_NM, USE_YN, REG_DATE, REG_SN, MOD_DATE, MOD_SN) VALUES (#{adminSn}, #{adminId}, #{adminPw}, #{adminNm}, #{useYn}, #{regDate}, #{regSn}, #{modDate}, #{modSn})
